title: heimer is unbeatable unless you counter him with Syndra
body:
in a game right now as lux vs heim, and lux is suppose to be a counter according to championselect lost my turret less than 3-4 minutes

we are winning but by other reason, you can for sure tell heim is obvious a much higher tier ap mid than lux. Someone go pull up Elementz's tier list bet you
